snippet: President François Hollande ordered his 38 cabinet ministers to publicly declare their holdings as part of an effort to “moralize” French politics.
abstract: President Francois Hollande orders his 38 cabinet ministers to publicly declare their estate holdings as part of an effort to 'moralize' French politics and encourage transparency; declarations released so far show many of cabinet members have finances well above French median of 113,500 euros.
lead_paragraph: President François Hollande ordered his 38 cabinet ministers to publicly declare their holdings as part of an effort to “moralize” French politics.

headline.seo: French Cabinet Ministers Disclose Their Financial Worth
headline.main: Under Orders, French Officials Reveal Financial Worth
headline.print_headline: Under Orders, French Officials Reveal Financial Worth
